attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The tag name of the element; must include a dash (-)

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The JS class name for your created element

attributes.name: base
attributes.description: The base classname for your element; defaults to 'LitElement'

tags.name: property
tags.description: A defined property for your element

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of your property in the produced JS class.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The JS type of the property

attributes.name: default
attributes.description: The default value of the property. This is required, and is parsed as JavaScript.

attributes.name: attribute
attributes.description: The corresponding HTML attribute name. Will be auto-set from the property name if not specified. If false, no attribute will be made.

attributes.name: reflect
attributes.description: If present, setting the property will change the HTML element's attribute.

tags.name: prop
tags.description: A defined property for your element

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of your property in the produced JS class.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The JS type of the property

attributes.name: default
attributes.description: The default value of the property. This is required, and is parsed as JavaScript.

attributes.name: attribute
attributes.description: The corresponding HTML attribute name. Will be auto-set from the property name if not specified. If false, no attribute will be made.

attributes.name: reflect
attributes.description: If present, setting the property will change the HTML element's attribute.

tags.name: script
tags.description: The JavaScript code for your element. Import, define your class, etc

attributes.name: lang
attributes.description: The JS language used. If not provided, defaults to 'js'. Values other than js will be compiled using the specified language tools.

attributes.name: lang
attributes.description: The CSS language used. If not provided, defaults to 'css'. Values other than css will be compiled using the specified language tools.
